validation_message.parameter_id_required_max: Code must be less than 8 characters!
validation_message.parameter_id_match: Code must contain only digits and letters!
validation_message.description_max: Description must be less than 80 characters
validation_message.order_min: Must be larger or equals to 0

confirmation.enable: Are you sure want to enable {{length}} selected parameter code?
confirmation.disable: Are you sure want to disable {{length}} selected parameter code?

confirmation.disable_many: Are you sure want to disable {{length}} selected parameter codes?

tooltip.attributes_semicolon_separated: Must be a semicolon separated string of the attribute names. The attribute names themselves
tooltip.attributes_contain_characters: Must contain only A-Z, a-z, 0-9 and underscore (_) character
tooltip.attributes_not_begin_number: Must not begin with a number
